Add cascading query feature plan with comprehensive location data

  and United States \(50 states + DC, ~30 cities each\)
- Update CLAUDE.md with Phase 6 cascading query feature specification
- Include TypeScript interfaces and helper functions for location data
- Document cascading checkbox logic for bulk query creation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Enhance Phase 6 plan for enterprise scale + trim US cities to 20

Plan Updates:
- Compact 3-column dashboard UI design
- Async queue system \(fire & forget processing\)
- Duplicate query detection with navigation prompt
- Scale architecture for thousands of keywords
- Real-time Firestore updates, batch operations

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement Phase 7: Enterprise Scale Quarry System

Complete implementation of the enterprise-scale query management system
with bulk operations, position ranking, queue management, and data quality.

Phase 7a-7c: Core Quarry System
- Add BaseTerm model and CRUD endpoints
- Create Quarry Dashboard with base terms management
- Implement bulk query generation across 1,280+ cities
- Add cascading location selectors \(Country → Province → City\)

Phase 7d: Local Queries Dashboard Update
- Compact QueryCard design \(50% smaller\)
- 4-column responsive grid layout
- Enhanced filters with geo dropdowns
- Bulk selection with checkboxes
- Keyword search with debouncing

Phase 7e: Position Ranking & Sorting
- Capture googlePosition during extraction
- Add customPosition for manual ordering
- Drag-and-drop reordering in DataPreviewTable
- Sort toggle between Google/Custom order
- PATCH endpoint for position updates

Phase 7f: Latest Version & Directory Publishing
- Set as Latest button in version history
- Publish to Directory action
- Star badge for latest version indicator
- Confirmation dialogs for actions

Phase 7g: Async Queue System
- In-memory queue service with pause/resume
- Queue status bar with controls
- Add to queue / retry failed endpoints
- Bulk run integration with queue

Phase 7h: Data Quality & Cleanup
- Phone normalization \(E.164 format\)
- URL validation and normalization
- Duplicate detection by placeId
- Data quality scoring \(0-100\)
- DataQualityBadge and QualityReportCard components

New API Endpoints:
- /api/base-terms \(CRUD\)
- /api/base-terms/{id}/generate
- /api/businesses/{id}/position
- /api/queries/{id}/versions/{vid}/latest
- /api/queries/{id}/versions/{vid}/publish
- /api/queue/* \(status, add, pause, resume, retry-failed\)
- /api/queries/{id}/versions/{vid}/quality-report

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
